statements: SELECT wrestler_name, salary FROM wrestlers;
SELECT * FROM wrestlers WHERE expiry_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT wrestler_name, salary, expiry_date FROM wrestlers WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT wrestler_name, expiry_date FROM wrestlers ORDER BY wrestler_name DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, special_clauses FROM wrestlers WHERE special_clauses IS NOT NULL AND salary < 100000 ORDER BY salary ASC;
SELECT * FROM wrestlers WHERE wrestler_name = 'John Cena';
SELECT wrestler_name, salary FROM wrestlers WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY wrestler_name DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, expiry_date FROM wrestlers WHERE wrestler_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 AND expiry_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT wrestler_id, wrestler_name, special_clauses FROM wrestlers WHERE special_clauses LIKE '%bonus%' ORDER BY wrestler_id;
SELECT wrestler_name, salary, expiry_date, special_clauses FROM wrestlers WHERE salary < 100000 AND expiry_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY salary ASC, expiry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM wrestlers;
SELECT wrestler_id, wrestler_name, salary FROM wrestlers WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT wrestler_name, contract_date, contract_value FROM wrestlers JOIN contracts ON wrestlers.wrestler_id = contracts.wrestler_id;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE contract_length >= 3 ORDER BY contract_date DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, expiry_date FROM wrestlers WHERE expiry_date < CURDATE();
SELECT wrestler_name, salary FROM wrestlers WHERE wrestler_id = 1;
SELECT wrestler_name, salary, expiry_date FROM wrestlers WHERE wrestler_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM wrestlers WHERE wrestler_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, contract_date, contract_length, contract_value FROM wrestlers w JOIN contracts c ON w.wrestler_id = c.wrestler_id WHERE w.wrestler_id = 3 AND c.contract_length >= 3;

SELECT wrestler_id, COUNT(contract_id) as total_contracts FROM wrestlers w LEFT JOIN contracts c ON w.wrestler_id = c.wrestler_id GROUP BY wrestler_id HAVING total_contracts > 1 ORDER BY total_contracts DESC;
SELECT * FROM Wrestlers;
SELECT wrestler_name, salary FROM Wrestlers ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, title_name FROM Wrestlers INNER JOIN Titles ON Wrestlers.wrestler_id = Titles.wrestler_id;
SELECT wrestler_name, expiry_date FROM Wrestlers WHERE expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_wrestlers FROM Wrestlers;
SELECT wrestler_name, salary FROM Wrestlers WHERE expiry_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT wrestler_name, salary, title_name FROM Wrestlers JOIN Titles ON Wrestlers.wrestler_id = Titles.wrestler_id;
SELECT * FROM Contracts WHERE start_date >= '2022-06-01' AND end_date <= '2023-06-01';
SELECT wrestler_name, salary, DATE_PART('year', age(expiry_date)) AS remaining_months FROM Wrestlers;
SELECT wrestler_name, COUNT(contract_id) AS total_contracts FROM Wrestlers JOIN Contracts ON Wrestlers.wrestler_id = Contracts.wrestler_id GROUP BY wrestler_name;
SELECT wrestler_name, salary FROM WrestlerContracts;
SELECT wrestler_name, salary, expiry_date FROM WrestlerContracts ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, birth_date, height, weight FROM WrestlerDetails WHERE weight > 200;
SELECT wrestler_name, matches_won, matches_lost, total_matches FROM WrestlerStats ORDER BY total_matches DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM ContractHistory WHERE wrestler_id = 1;
SELECT wrestler_name, salary FROM WrestlerContracts
SELECT wrestler_name, expiry_date FROM WrestlerContracts ORDER BY expiry_date DESC
SELECT wrestler_name, matches_won, matches_lost, total_matches FROM WrestlerContracts JOIN WrestlerStats ON WrestlerContracts.wrestler_id = WrestlerStats.wrestler_id
SELECT wrestler_name, height, weight, hometown FROM WrestlerContracts JOIN WrestlerDetails ON WrestlerContracts.wrestler_id = WrestlerDetails.wrestler_id

SELECT wrestler_name, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM WrestlerContracts JOIN ContractHistory ON WrestlerContracts.wrestler_id = ContractHistory.wrestler_id ORDER BY contract_start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Wrestlers;
SELECT wrestler_id, name, salary FROM Wrestlers WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT title_name, wrestler_id FROM Titles ORDER BY title_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(salary) AS max_salary, MIN(salary) AS min_salary FROM Wrestlers;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Wrestlers ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT wrestler_id, name, salary FROM Wrestlers WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT title_name, name FROM Titles INNER JOIN Wrestlers ON Titles.wrestler_id = Wrestlers.wrestler_id;

SELECT Events.event_name, EventResults.winner_id, Wrestlers.name FROM Events INNER JOIN EventResults ON Events.event_id = EventResults.event_id INNER JOIN Wrestlers ON EventResults.winner_id = Wrestlers.wrestler_id;

SELECT Contracts.contract_id, Wrestlers.name, Contracts.start_date, Contracts.end_date FROM Contracts INNER JOIN Wrestlers ON Contracts.wrestler_id = Wrestlers.wrestler_id WHERE Contracts.salary > 5000;
